name: Untitled Sword Game
description:
WASD + Mouse

Thanks to all beta-testers, including Lucas A. who was a real help in adjusting the game's difficulty.

All art, programs, sound effects were made by me, although some are repurposed from other games/projects.

Engine: Construct 3 

Music: MuseScore 3 + Beepbox 

SFX: Chiptone

Art: Construct 3 + Adobe Photoshop

Nerd Data:

60 fps with dips into the low 50s with particle effects

230 x 144 resolution with low-quality fullscreen scaling and pixel rounding

2048 max spritesheet with 100 color level max during normal gameplay

High-performance GPU preferance
